sect1.title: parted-&parted-version;

sect2.title: Installation of parted
sect2.para: Install Parted by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
sed -i parted/ui.c \ -e "s:(CPPFunction\*) complete:(rl_completion_func_t\*) complete:" && ./configure --prefix=/usr --disable-static && make &&
make -C doc html && makeinfo --html -o doc/html doc/parted.texi && makeinfo --plaintext -o doc/parted.txt doc/parted.texi

sect2.para: If you have installed and wish to create PDF and Postcript documentation issue the following commands:

screen.userinput: texi2pdf -o doc/parted.pdf doc/parted.texi && texi2dvi -o doc/parted.dvi doc/parted.texi && dvips -o doc/parted.ps doc/parted.dvi

sect2.para: To test the results, issue: make check. Note that many tests are skipped if not run as the root user.

screen.userinput: make install && install -v -m755 -d /usr/share/doc/parted-&parted-version;/html && install -v -m644 doc/html/* \ /usr/share/doc/parted-&parted-version;/html && install -v -m644 doc/{FAT,API,parted.{txt,html}} \ /usr/share/doc/parted-&parted-version;

sect2.para: Install the optional PDF and Postscript documentation by issuing the following command as the root user:

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: sed -i parted/ui.c ...: This sed fixes building with Readline 6.x (x>2).
--disable-device-mapper: This option disables device mapper support. Add this parameter if you have not installed LVM2.
